subsection_analysis.refined_text: Instructions:  o  Peel and shred green papaya and carrot.  o  Crush garlic and chilies in a mortar and pestle.  o  Add fish sauce, lime juice, and sugar, mix well.  o  Toss shredded papaya, carrot, and sliced tomatoes with the dressing.  o  Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve.
